scripts.authlocalinvoke: sam local invoke IPAuthorizerLambda --event ip-authorizer/event.json --env-vars ip-authorizer/env.json
scripts.backlocalinvoke: sam local invoke BackendLambda --event backend-lambda/event.json --env-vars backend-lambda/env.json
scripts.deploysam: sam build && sam deploy --stack-name im-sam --resolve-s3 --region us-east-1 --confirm-changeset
scripts.deployapp: cd react-cors-spa && npm run build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://im.react.app
